0: House_18 is close to public transport, has a south-facing orientation, and is well-maintained. The house may be on the smaller side, but it is very well-kept and efficient. This is a great choice for those looking for an affordable house with all the necessary amenities.
3: Community_3 is located in Chaoyang District, Beijing, and is surrounded by a metro, supermarkets, malls, hospitals, parks, schools, restaurants, and banks. It has a rent of 40 dollars per square meter and is considered to be a safe and child-friendly neighborhood. There is also a good daycare nearby.
